name: plunderer
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who steals or removes things, especially in a violent or severe way: He was an art dealer and one of the Third Reich's most notorious art plunderers. Many archaeologists regard metal detectorists as ignorant plunderers. See
plunder
More examplesFewer examplesThe empty houses are vulnerable to plunderers.The museum still houses huge centuries-old statues, items too heavy for plunderers to haul off. Overseas students were presented as unpatriotic and their host countries as "brain plunderers".
